question: Format answer for: Regarding patient 'AII-11' from family 'Family A': Is there a family history of the disease?
context:
Yes, there is a family history of the disease for patient 'AII-11' from 'Family A'.

The document states in the "Clinical Presentation" section on page 3: "His father and 4 of 8 siblings were diagnosed with PD (Fig. 1A)...". Figure 1A on page 3 also visually depicts this family history, showing the father (I-1) and several siblings of AII-11 (II-1, II-2, II-3, II-5, II-6, II-8, II-10) as affected individuals.
